name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026: A Celebration of Alternative Sounds and Global Talent**  
Pinkpop 2026 brings together 32 artists from around the world, offering a rich variety of genres that lean heavily into alternative and indie sounds. With 8 acts representing Alternative Rock, 7 from Pop, and 6 from Indie Rock, the lineup is a testament to the festival’s commitment to showcasing contemporary and innovative music. Genres like Electropop, Post-Punk, and Punk Rock also make notable appearances, ensuring a dynamic and genre-crossing experience for attendees.  

The festival highlights an impressive international mix, with artists hailing from the United Kingdom, the United States, the Netherlands, and beyond. The Netherlands contributes 7 acts, shining a light on local talent, while the UK and US dominate the roster with 9 acts each. Despite a predominantly male lineup (20 male acts versus 8 female and 4 mixed-gender groups), Pinkpop 2026 also features a broad spectrum of styles and perspectives, demonstrating its commitment to musical diversity.  

Audience feedback underscores a generally positive reception, with an average artist rating of 6.88 and 100% of artists receiving Spotify links for easy discovery. While there’s limited representation of artists of color (1 out of 32), the festival’s wide-reaching genre and geographical diversity provide a platform for a mix of voices and styles. Pinkpop 2026 promises an electrifying celebration of music that bridges boundaries and brings fans together.
